description: Try our easy to follow Christmas Spiced Cupcakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Christmas Spiced Cupcakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a 12 hole cupcake pan with cupcake paper cases.
Beat the butter, brown sugar and egg with an electric mixer until pale and thickened.
Sift the dry ingredients into the mix, and then add the milk and golden syrup. Mix on medium speed until mixture is smooth. Evenly divide mixture between cupcake cases
Bake for 25 minutes or until cooked. Cool cakes on a wire rack.
To make the icing, sift the icing sugar into a bowl. Add the milk and margarine, and beat with an electric mixer until mixture is smooth.
Ice the cakes and decorate with Christmas decorations.
